title: Futbol Americas: Jordan Pefok Exclusive Interview
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to the latest string of transfers from MLS and Liga MX, including Brian Rodriguez, Martin Caceres and Cristian Tello. Then, Herc gives his USMNT midfield depth chart. Who takes the last two spots on the roster? Next, Jordan Pefok has a one-on-one sit down with Sebi where he talks about his move to Union Berlin and his position with the U.S. Men's National Team. Later, the guys give their Top 5 CONCACAF players that need to move clubs in Europe.
